title: December Note
subtitle: Special Adoration & Confession times
body: PLEASE SEE THE BULLETIN FOR SPECIAL ADORATION AND CONFESSION TIMES DURING DECEMBER. Please check the bulletin for weekday Mass times.

title: Blood Drive
subtitle: 10:00 AM · St. Rose Auditorium
body: Blood Drive at St. Rose Auditorium.

title: Adoration + Confession (St. Rose)
subtitle: 5:00 PM · St. Rose
body: Adoración Eucarística con Confesión en Santa Rosa.

title: 24-hour 1st Friday Adoration Begins
subtitle: 6:00 PM · St. Patrick Church
body: 24-hour 1st Friday Adoration begins at St. Patrick.

title: Adoration Continues (St. Patrick)
subtitle: Children’s Adoration until 4:00 PM · Benediction 5:55 PM
body: Eucharistic Adoration continues. Children’s Adoration until 4:00 PM. Benediction at 5:55 PM.

title: Spanish Men’s Bible Study
subtitle: 7:30 PM · St. Rose MR 2
body: Estudio Bíblico en Español para Hombres (SR MR 2).

title: Baptism Prep Class (English)
subtitle: 7:00 PM · St. Rose MR 1 · MUST RSVP
body: English baptism prep class. MUST RSVP through the parish office.

title: Coffee & Donuts
subtitle: 9:15 AM · St. Rose Auditorium
body: Coffee & donuts at St. Rose Auditorium.

title: Knights of Columbus Free-Throw Competition
subtitle: 5:00–7:00 PM · Parish Center at St. Patrick
body: Boys and girls ages 9–14. Entry forms in the back of each church; walk-ins welcome. Parents encouraged to stay. Call Dennis Redburn: 620-617-2198.
